array.string: SCRIPT="$HOME/.local/share/zen-free-models/sync.sh"; TARGET="$(readlink "$SCRIPT" 2>/dev/null || true)"; if [[ -n "$TARGET" && -f "$TARGET" ]]; then REPO_ROOT="$(dirname "$(dirname "$TARGET")")"; LOG_DIR="$REPO_ROOT/.runtime"; else LOG_DIR="$HOME/.cache/zen-free-models"; fi; mkdir -p "$LOG_DIR"; "$SCRIPT" >> "$LOG_DIR/launchd.log" 2>> "$LOG_DIR/launchd.err.log"
